patterns: What is corona?
responses: Corona means virus,is it COVID-19

Coronaviruses are a large family of viruses which may cause illness in animals or humans.  In humans, several coronaviruses are known to cause respiratory infections ranging from the common cold to more severe diseases such as Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) and Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS). The most recently discovered coronavirus causes coronavirus disease COVID-19.

patterns: What is covid-19 ?
what is the COVID-19
responses: COVID-19 is the infectious disease caused by the most recently discovered coronavirus.This new virus and disease were unknown before the outbreak began in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. COVID-19 is now a pandemic affecting many countries globally

patterns: Do the doors and windows of the house always have to be closed?

patterns: Should kids be allowed to go play outside now?
responses: No, in the case of the disaster we are now in, we must actually keep the children home until this situation is overcome.

patterns: What is the risk of corona virus for those with asthma?
responses: Experts say the virus is "extremely risky" for those with severe asthma. Because those who have asthma, like the coronavirus infection, the symptoms of asthma will start.

patterns: How much is the risk of infection from money or coins, door handles and other hard things we catch with our hands?
responses: If someone is infected with this virus or has a cough, the cough sticks to his hand and if he touches something with that hand, that thing can be infected. Door handles can be especially risky.

patterns: Can Corona come back every year?
responses: Yes. Most scientists think the virus is more prevalent in winter. Experts are asking us to prepare in advance for the winter.

patterns: You may have to wait how long the antidote is to arrive?
responses: It may take a year and a half. Work is underway in the United States and China. In the short time, some seemingly effective drugs may come to save people.

patterns: Once it is done, is it possible to happen again?
responses: Maybe 4% of healthy people in China have a record of being infected again!
